short.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: Automatically downloads your Faceit demos to your desired destination.

long.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G:
Side panel extension that will connect to your Faceit account and allow you to download your demos to your desired destination.

For support:
* Please join this discord server https://discord.gg/AvCRNgswwx to report bugs

Instructions:
* Make sure you have logged into Faceit
* Click on the extension icon to immediately open the side panel
* Under `System Status` press refresh to allow the extension to set-up your system, which is valid Faceit session, valid Leetify session and valid tab for downloading demos
* Once `System Status` is all green please go ahead and fetch your latest matches - you can `Load More` at the bottom of the list once you have processed all your matches
* If you have recently played more matches you can use `Fetch latest` to fetch latest matches that are not currently in the list
* Once you have a list of match with `Status` of `Waiting` you can proceed and start the queue by pressing the button `Load available matches` which will start the loading process of queueing up the matches (this can take up to minute depending on how large of a queue you are trying to process) and afterwards it will start processing them
* If you gets stuck or you wish to stop the queue just press the `Stop queue` button
* Once in a while you might get rate limited, you will see a message in that scenario - just wait the mentioned time period and start the queue again

For troubleshooting:
* Try to open close the side panel when things are not loading or are stuck
* Try to periodically check if the `System Status` is all green by pressing the `Refresh` button
* There are some race conditions with Finding faceit tab - just be patient and itterate between Refreshing the status and Finding the faceit tab
* Worst case scenario, uninstall the extension and install it again :)
